name: Siege of Chaos VR
description:
Siege of Chaos is a conventional tower defense game created as a solo project for the Oculus Quest & Quest 2. Build towers and use your crossbow to defend the fortress against waves of attackers in VR. 

This game was born out of love for VR, and because it seemed like this genre was severely underrepresented among VR games. 

Please keep in mind that this game is a work in progress, and certainly not bug-free. Any feedback is welcome & appreciated.
